creator: Danielcampelo@google.pt
text:
Was it suposed for the SVGGraphics2D.getDOMFactory(), return the document we 
used to creat the SVGGraphics2D or to return it actualized? with the changes we 
made to it? 
It would improve extreamly the perfomance when transforming, cause like this it 
wouldn't be necessary to write the graphics to a file to transform it into an 
image afterwards... By the way it's easier to creat the graphics using this 
class than to creat directly the elements into a document...
If you find a way to resolve this situation or if it is already resolved, or 
haven't understand my doubt please inform or ask me.

Thanks Daniel

Daniel,

The Document is only used as a 'factory' and elements are not
added to the Document tree. If you'd like to do this, you can
do it by adding the SVGGraphics2D's root to the Document: no
need to go through a streaming/parsing phase.

Regards,
Vincent.
creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com
